title: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
desc: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
org: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare

records.QueryText: information regarding to control of aphoids jassids and white fly  in cotton
records.KccAns: sapray 800 ml fosmit in 150 liter of water/acre

records.QueryText: TELL ME WHITE GRUB OF GROUNDNUT

records.KccAns: USE QUNOLPHOS 25 EC 4 LITER/ HECTOR WITH IRRIGATION

records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING CONTROL OF LEAF FOLDER IN RICE?
records.KccAns: SPRAY CHLOROPYRIPHOS 20 EC @ 1 LITER IN 100 LITERS OF WATER/ACRE.

records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING USE OF NEEM COATED UREA ?
records.KccAns: NEEM COATED UREA IS LESS DILUTED , LARGE IN SIZE AND SLOW RELEASE OF NITROGEN

records.QueryText: how to control leaf curl aphid in tomato ?
records.KccAns: control leaf curl aphid in tomato is spray rogor @ 1 ml/litre of water.

records.QueryText: information regarding control of affid and tharips in cotton ?
records.KccAns: spray 400 ml malathion in 200 Ltr of water /acre .

records.QueryText: TELL ME SUBCIDY ON SOLAR PUMP
TELL ME CONTROL OF BACTERIAL BLIGHT IN GUAR
records.KccAns: SPRAY OF COC 45 GM + 2 GM STREPTOCYCLINE PAR TANKI

records.QueryText: RICE LEAF FODLER PROBLEM IN PADDY?
records.KccAns: SPRAY 1 LITRE CHLOROPYRIPHO0S IN 100 LITRES OF WATER PER ACRE
good ke sath daliya milaker khilay

records.QueryText: asking about veterinary kancheepuram kattupakkam contact no.

records.KccAns: Quinalphas ka 1.5 ml / lit ka spray kara de
10-20 % chances of rain in next 3 days

records.QueryText: mango me planofix kitna lagate hai
records.KccAns: planofix ka 5 ml/ 10 lit ka spray kara de
spray bayleton 50 gm in 100 litres water.

records.QueryText: information regarding subsidy on zero till seed drill?
records.KccAns: 15000rs or 50% of cost subsidy on zero till seed drill.

records.QueryText: DOSE OF    CHLOROPYRIPHOS     IN APPLE  TREES
records.KccAns: DOSE  IS 2 GRAMS  PER  LITRE OF  WATER

records.QueryText: Aphids and White Fly control in cotton crop?
records.KccAns: Spray Acephate 250 gram in 200 litre of water / acre

records.QueryText: information regarding control of fungal diseases in cotton ?
records.KccAns: spray 700 gm COC + 8 gm streptocyclin in 150 Ltr of water /acre .

records.QueryText: how to control fungal diseases in paddy crop ?
records.KccAns: spray to bavistin @ 400-500 gm in 200-250 liter of water / acre .

records.QueryText: TELL ME ROOT ROT CONTROL IN GWAR
records.KccAns: TRICHODERMA 2.5 KG MIX WITH COW DUNG 100 KG USE  / HA

records.QueryText: TELL ME TRMAIT CONTROAL OF GROUNDNUT
TELL  ME LEAF  BORER CONTROL IN COTTON
records.KccAns: SPRAY OF  ACEPHATE 75 SP 2 GM /LITTER WATER

records.QueryText: information regarding fertilizer dose in grape
Dairy Ke leyae lown ki jankari leni hai
TELL ME ABOUT GROWTH IN GUAR
records.KccAns: SPRAY OF NPK @ 10 GRAM/LITER WATER IN GUAR

records.QueryText: How to control Early Blight in Tomato?
records.KccAns: Spray 400 gm. M-45 in 200 lt. of water per acre.
5.0 Gram Zinc Sulphate+20 Gram Urea ko / liter pani me mela krke spary kre

records.QueryText: TELL ME WEATHER INFORMATION OF JAISALMER
records.KccAns: NOT RAINFALL NEXT FIVE DAYS OF JAISALMER
weather information  - Overcast; a shower or thunderstorm in spots this evening followed by a couple of showers late

records.QueryText: TELL ME ABOUT PEST IN MOONG

records.KccAns: Pretilachlor 50% EC @400-600 ml (to be applied within 5 days  transplanting)
apply DAP 50 kg + neem cake 10kg + FYM 10 ton /ac
NO RAIN FALL UP TO 5 DAYS

records.QueryText: TELL ME YELLOWING MANAGEMENT IN GROUNDNUT
records.KccAns: SPRAY OF FERUS SULPHATE 5 GM + CITRIC ACID 1 GM PER LITER WATER

records.QueryText: TELL ME ABOUT PEST IN SOYABEAN
records.KccAns: SPRAY OF TRIJOPHOS 40% EC @ 2 ML/LITER WATER IN SOYABEAN
spray isoproturon-750gm/ha in 750 ltr of water
network badalkar  apne gujrat men call kare .

records.QueryText: Maize which is two months crop,tip portion of few plants are drying.Which chemical should be sprayed?
records.KccAns: This is due to stem borer problem.First destroy the infected plants then apply Carbaryl 4G to the tip portion of the plants @ 6 kgs/ac.

records.QueryText: How much does of Eathril in Apple ?
records.KccAns: Does of Eathril are 500 ml + Planofix @ 45 Ml / 200 Liters of water.
actra 5 gm + bavistim 30 gm 15 liter water

records.QueryText: ganne me keede ke liye kon se dawa dale?
records.KccAns: CARTUP HIDROCHLOIRDE 10 KG/ACAR +40-50 KG UREA MAI MILAKAR KETH MAI DALNE KE BAD SICHHAI KARE
SPRAY OF MONOCROTOPHOS 2ML+ MANCOZEB 2GM / LIT. WATER
cumbu variety CO 7, CO (Cu) 9, X 7, ICMV 221, TNAU cumbu hybrid Co 9
USE CLOROPAYRIPHOS 20% EC 1 LTR /BIGHA WHEN IRRIGATION
